name: Springtime in the Flower Chamber
description:
Create the perfect garden under the loving supervision of a more experienced gardener.

  • WHEN YOU PLAY, YOU’LL BE SURE TO ENJOY:
    •  An assortment of gorgeous flowers! 
    •  A scenic and mysterious cell!
    •  Constructive criticism / light humiliation!
    •  The company of a positively CUTE gardener :) 
    •  And much, much, much more!!!

The game is about 10 minutes long so far. More updates to come!
